title: Interpretation of seeing a deceased person in a dream talking and laughing

preview.html: If you ever dreamed of a dead person, in this article you can see the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream and talk about its meaning in detail. Related to the dreamer or the deceased, as the dreamer feels that there is a hidden message behind these dreams that he feels confused and curious about whether this message is good for a happy event in his life or warns him of an unpleasant event that represents a big problem. Interpretation of seeing the dead person speaking in a dreamSeeing the dead person in a dream for a son Sirin Imam Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing the dead person talking to the dreamer and telling him that he is still alive is a praiseworthy vision, and an indication of the dead person’s status in the afterlife. If the dreamer sees that the deceased is talking to him and asking him to do something that will anger God, then this vision is the work of Satan and must be avoided. The dreamer is to ask for God’s forgiveness. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of the dream of a dead person speaking in a dream: As for Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of this dream, if he sees him talking to him in the dreamer’s house, this vision means that he is in a better place in the afterlife, and God knows best. Among the symbols of seeing a dead person speaking in a dream is that it is good news of the coming of relief and the death of worries. And sorrows. In the event that we see a dead person in a dream with an unpleasant appearance, then this vision shows the sins and sins that this dead person has committed in this world. But if the dreamer sees that he does not want to talk to the dreamer, then this vision is an indication of an act committed by the dreamer in reality that angered the dead. If the dead person’s conversation with the dreamer is a reproach and admonition directed at him, then this vision is a message warning the dreamer of the need to stay away from the sins and sins that he commits in reality. However, in the event that the dead person speaks and cries for the dreamer, this vision is not good for him and shows the punishment that he will receive in the future. His grave and the dreamer needs to pray and give charity, and God knows best. Seeing the deceased father talking to the dreamer and crying over him is a hateful vision for the dreamer as well, and indicates that the dreamer is going through a major crisis in his life. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen on seeing the dead person speaking in a dream. The dream interpreter Ibn Shaheen narrated that if he sees The dreamer is talking to him and wants to give him bread, then this vision means that the dead person is asking for forgiveness, zakat, and supplication. If we see the dead person talking to the dreamer and he gets angry with him and hits him, then this vision shows that this dreamer is committing many sins and disobedience and he must repent. If the dreamer The deceased talks to him and gives him dirty clothes. This vision warns the dreamer that poverty will affect him, and God knows best. Seeing the dead person talking and taking food or money from him indicates a lack of livelihood. Interpretation of seeing the deceased in a dream talking and laughing. If you see the deceased talking to the fortuneteller and laughing, this vision is worthy. With praise and indicates the fortuneteller’s goodness and livelihood, it indicates finding a job opportunity, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees his deceased mother talking and laughing in a dream, then this vision symbolizes his kindness, happiness, strength, and good news about his good conditions in this world. In the event that you see a dead brother in a dream and he He talks and laughs, this vision indicates the coming of comfort and the removal of worries, and for the debtor it is a sign of...

title: Interpretation of the call to prayer in a dream by senior imams

preview.html: What is the interpretation of the call to prayer in a dream? Some may search for an interpretation of the call to prayer in a dream, as this dream is one of the dreams that must be interpreted or interpreted accurately, because the call originally came from the vision of the companion Abdullah bin Zaid, may God have mercy on him. May God be pleased with him. It was mentioned in the honorable biography of the Prophet that Abdullah bin Zaid, may God be pleased with him, saw the call to prayer in his sleep and said to the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, and he said to him: “This is a true vision, so get up and tell Bilal, for his voice is louder than yours.” The Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, said to him: Glory be to Him and may He be exalted. To God because this has been proven. In this article, a different website provides you with an interpretation of the call to prayer in a dream. Interpretation of the call to prayer in a dream in general According to Ibn Sirin, he says in the interpretation of the call to prayer in a dream that it can be a sign of Hajj or it can indicate calling people or gaining power and authority, as it can indicate injustice if the muezzin increases or decreases the call or changes, and the interpretation of the call to prayer depends on the dream of the place of the call to prayer, the dreamer's condition and the different circumstances of the vision. Among the stories of interpreting the call to prayer in a dream narrated by Ibn Sirin, which indicates the sensitivity of interpreting the vision of the call to prayer in a dream, is that two men came to Ibn Sirin and he saw them in a dream that he made the call to prayer. He said: “I saw in the first a good sign and in the second a very good sign.” As for Sheikh Al-Nabulsi, the interpretation of the call to prayer in a dream can be a sign of preparing for wars, as it can indicate the approach of marriage for unmarried people, or a sign of good news and gossip, and God Almighty. The highest and most knowledgeable. Interpretation of hearing the call to prayer in a dream Ibn Sirin says - on the authority of Abu Saad -: Whoever sees that he heard the call twice, then twice, and prayed the obligatory prayer, this is a sign that God has commanded him to perform Hajj or Umrah, as this is the call of Arafat to prayer. Ibn Sirin says: Seeing the call to prayer in a dream may be evidence of the separation of the two friends, because seeing the call to prayer in the procession may be evidence of the presence of a thief in their midst, based on the story of our master Joseph with his brothers. They will be thieves)) verse 70, as the call to prayer in the camp is evidence of the presence of a spy among them and seeing the call to prayer in the markets indicates the death of a man at the hands of the market men, just as anyone who hears a hateful call to prayer in a dream may be harmed and pray for him, and this is what Ibn Sirin narrated on the authority of Daniel the Younger. Hearing the dawn call in a dream requires nourishment, prosperity and guidance. As for hearing the noon call, it is evidence of paying off debts, and hearing the evening call in a dream is evidence of the call to the end, so the matter is the one who saw it. As for hearing the Maghrib call to prayer, it is evidence of the end of the matter and seeing the time of hearing the call to prayer. Dinner in a dream is a warning to the dreamer, reminding him and warning him against laziness and negligence. Interpretation of seeing someone calling to prayer in a dream If a person dreams that the sound of the call to prayer is coming from his house, this indicates the death of a person residing in that house. If a woman sees the sound of the call to prayer in her dream, this means that she will receive many good things. Seeing someone calling the call in a dream, but not saying the call in its correct form,

Dinner in a dream is a warning to the dreamer, reminding him and warning him against laziness and neglect. title: Interpretation of the veil in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing the veil in a dream

preview.html: What is the meaning of the hijab, veil, or niqab for single women, pregnant women, divorced women, engaged women, married men, and single young men, whether worn, bought, or taken off? The white black of Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and others. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s veil. Ibn Sirin narrated that the niqab in a dream symbolizes concealment and purity, and the niqab in a dream indicates sustenance, goodness, and success from God Almighty, and the niqab in a woman’s dream refers to the husband and indicates his good morals. She declares her purity and good religiosity. A woman’s veil is her husband, her cover, and her master, and its power is the power of his condition, his fitness, the abundance of his money, and the whiteness of his religion and status. The woman is as if she is wearing a rain veil, this indicates that the woman’s enemies are deceiving her and distorting her image in front of her husband. Interpretation of the dream about the veil according to Nabulsi: The veil in the dream is the woman’s husband and the woman must cover her and adorn herself. If she does not have a husband, her wealth will be harmed or her values ​​will be denied by her brother or uncle. If the man sees that she is wearing the mask, this affects the maid. If a woman sees that she has removed her hijab from her head in a crowd of people, then she will be affected by what takes away her modesty, and if she sees that her husband has left her hijab, and if he returns to it. She and her husband return, and the veil is the man’s religion. Interpretation of the dream about the veil by Ibn Shaheen: Women have wives, and men have wives, and if a woman sees an accident in her mask, such as kidnapping, burning, or the like, this indicates the death of her husband, or his divorce from her. If she sees that one of her masks has been burned, this indicates harm to her husband from the king. In general, a dream about a covered veil or veil is interpreted from four aspects: a man has a woman, a woman has a husband, a servant, a maid, and a benefactor on the part of the woman. The one who pursues her without a hijab, this indicates the killing of her husband or someone dear to her in her family, and perhaps her husband has been defiled by a forbidden woman. She sees that her veil is black and worn, and her dream shows her husband’s foolishness and poverty, and the dream of a rainy veil is evidence of the woman’s enemies deceiving her. If you dream that you are wearing the veil, this means that you are not completely loyal to the one you love and you will use tricks and deception to keep him. Seeing others wearing the veil means that friends Counterfeiters are trying to harm you and harm you. As for seeing an old or torn veil in your dream, this means that you are living in a wave of intrigue, deception, and conspiracies. If a girl dreams that she has lost the veil, this means that her lover is aware and understands her cunning ways and takes revenge on her. If you see the bride’s veil in your dream, This means that you will make a successful leap in the field of work in the future and you will experience many joys in your position. If a young woman dreams of wearing the hijab, she will be preoccupied with things that will be the cause of her lasting happiness and benefit from it. If she loses the hijab or is involved in an accident, this means that she will be overcome by sorrows. And pain and difficult circumstances will surround her. If you throw the veil aside in a dream, this means scandal or divorce. If you see the mourning veil worn by a woman in a dream, this means decline and losses in trade and business, and many problems, worries and sorrow. Interpretation of the veil in

title: Interpretation of a dream about fried eggs for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about fried eggs in a dream for one girl: seeing a single girl in her dream that she is eating eggs with someone she knows. The vision suggests that she will marry a man with all the qualities she wants. A single girl saw that she was getting a reward from her boss and the reward was a bowl full of fried eggs. The vision indicated It indicates that she will obtain a prominent position in her work and that she will enjoy a lot of money. When she saw the single girl eating fried eggs with a stranger, she spoke to him casually. The vision indicated that she will communicate with a man with whom she feels safe and happy. The vision is also evidence that she will marry a good man. Morals. Seeing an unmarried girl eating fried eggs with bread is good news for gaining a wide and sudden livelihood. Seeing fried eggs in general in an unmarried girl’s dream portends a change in her life for the better. It also indicates the comfort that she will enjoy after getting rid of obstacles. Eggs Fried eggs in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of the money she will receive. See also: Interpretation of dreams about eggs for a pregnant womanInterpretation of seeing a dream about fried eggs in a married woman’s dream Fried eggs in a married woman’s dream indicate the relationship between her family members. If a married woman sees that she is buying If a married woman sees fried eggs in a dream, she will She will get pregnant soon. And that he will have good sons and daughters. Seeing a married woman eating fried eggs in her dream. Evidence that she and her relatives will be blessed with goodness and the poor. A married woman seeing a broken egg before frying it is an unpleasant dream. They proved that there was a problem in her married life, but soon They get rid of them. Seeing a married woman buying fried eggs, and eating them at the same time, is good news that she will achieve what she wants. Interpretation of seeing a dream about fried eggs in a dream about the man and its meaning. The man sees in his dream that he is eating eggs with appetite, and these eggs have a pleasant smell. The vision showed that he can To achieve the dreams that he was striving to achieve. Scientists believe that seeing a man in his dream eating fried eggs and their taste was wonderful. Evidence that he will get rid of all the obstacles and fears that he faces in his life. Seeing fried eggs in general in a man’s dream is good news that the dreamer will He pays off all his debts or finds a new job. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about seeing eggs. The meaning of seeing a dream about fried eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If a pregnant woman sees that she is eating well-baked eggs, she will give birth to a beautiful girl. And seeing herself taking eggs from her husband and eating them is evidence that Her husband takes care of her and brings her livelihood. It also indicates that he is trying to make her give birth easily without any fatigue and encourages her to have a pain-free birth. It is also evidence that she will give birth to a healthy child. Seeing a pregnant woman eating fried eggs with her husband is an indication of getting rid of the obstacles she faces. in

If a pregnant woman sees that she is eating well-baked eggs, she will give birth to a beautiful girl. It also indicates that he is trying to make her give birth easily without any fatigue and encourages her to have a pain-free birth. It is also evidence that she will give birth to a healthy child. title: Interpretation of seeing fruit in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: Fruit in a dream. It is worth noting that seeing fruit in a dream is considered one of the good visions that carry many positive meanings and connotations and vary based on the social and psychological state of the viewer and many interpretive scholars who have tried to do so. Explain the meanings of these dreams that indicate goodness, living and happiness, and in this article we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing fruits in a dream. Fruits in a dream for a married woman, as seeing fruits in a married woman’s dream is considered a good and good vision in its meanings and implications, especially as it indicates a happy and stable married life. And other connotations, and in this context we learn their interpretation. Seeing fruit in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is eating fruit. This dream is evidence that he will achieve the desire he wants to reach. Moreover, if a married woman dreams that she is eating fruit Rotten. This dream is evidence that this woman will face many problems and problems in the coming period of her life. Likewise if the woman is seen offering fruit to her husband. This dream is a sign of her husband’s new job or that he will get a promotion at work. Likewise if a married woman sees She herself is eating fruit from her husband’s hand. This dream will be evidence of her love and appreciation for marriage. See also: Interpretation of a dream of watching television for a single and married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Buying fruit in a dream for a single woman... Interpretation of seeing fruit in a dream, as seeing fruit in a dream is one of the visions that It includes many interpretations, as these interpretations differ based on the details that appear in the dream, as buying it is one of the promising visions, and in this context it will tell you the explanation of the interpretation. From the vision of buying fruit in a dream for a single woman is also: According to Al-Nabulsi: If a girl sees the fruit in a dream. This vision is good news for this girl to get married soon. Likewise, if you see fruits in a dream, this is an indication of what the dreamer hears about the happy news that It brings goodness to her, and God is Most High and knows that. Likewise, seeing fruits scattered in a dream over the head of an unmarried woman. It is a symbol of the good conduct and righteousness that this girl enjoys at the same time, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about jinn and demons in a dream by Ibn Sirin Its meaning in detail is the interpretation of seeing red fruits in a dream, as seeing the fruit differs in the interpretations it contains, and this depends on the type of fruit, as well as its color, and what is the individual’s situation regarding this dream, and many interpretation scholars who have tried to clarify the concepts of these dreams and in the context of the paragraph we explain the interpretation of the vision of red fruits In a dream it is also: It should be noted that seeing red fruits in a dream belongs to a married woman. It is evidence of an imminent new pregnancy. But seeing red fruits in a pregnant woman’s dream. It is evidence of nourishing the baby girl who will grow into a beautiful girl. Also, if one sees In the dream, the fruit is red in color. This dream is indicative

title: What do you know about the interpretation of seeing someone surviving a fall in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of surviving a fall in a dream Many people dream of this vision many times without knowing the reason, and yet they wake up directly without knowing what happened next, but everyone wants to understand the meaning clearly so that fear does not control them, and from here we will learn about the interpretation of the dream. Surviving a fall in a dream in a clear way in detail. Seeing escaping from falling in a dream This dream is a sign: The dreamer faces many difficulties that harm him in his life, but if he survives them, this is good evidence that he has emerged from all these difficulties in his life. This vision is evidence of the seriousness of this person and his struggle to achieve his goals quickly. This dream is evidence of the happiness that appears to the girl after she has gone through many difficulties that have greatly exhausted her in her life. The vision is a warning that the situation will change from failure to success, but patience is required to reach this point. Surviving a fall in a dream by Ibn Sirin Through Imam Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of this dream, several important concepts become clear to us, namely: Stopping an important project that was started and was not fully completed. The dreamer’s fall in an important place such as a mosque indicates his sincere repentance from all the sins he has committed. This great transformation that happens to the dreamer when he falls from a high place to a low place is clear evidence of a major change in his life. Interpretation of dreams of escaping a fall in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Imam Al-Nabulsi explains to us several clear meanings of this dream, which are: Sadness and despair from some negative situations in His life. Getting rid of seizures as a result of happy events ends these problems quickly. Interpretation of a dream about surviving a fall in a dream by Ibn Shaheen We find that Ibn Shaheen has different connotations of this vision, including: The inability to complete the work he seeks to achieve his goals and dreams. If the dreamer sees that he is trying to avoid this fall with great efforts, this is a sign that he has not made a decision or decision in his life. Perhaps this indicates that his work has been completed in a wonderful way to advance it and reach a high level, and the vision shows a lot of money coming to this dreamer to change his life for the most important and the best. Miller's dream interpretation There are clear meanings in Miller's Encyclopedia that explain to us everything we want to know about this vision for all people, including: If the dreamer feels great fear as a result of falling in a dream, this is a sign of his life full of problems that make him very sad, but we find that he can solve them and overcome them as long as it takes. He also achieves his ambitions in the end. But if he suffers any injury in the dream, this expresses the sadness that controls him either through illness or through the death of one of his acquaintances. If the dreamer controls himself and does not fall but remains suspended, this confirms a great failure that will happen to him in his life. Perhaps the dream shows a calamity to the dreamer that makes him hurt and lose a lot. The dream indicates that this person suffers from pain in his life and severe exhaustion. Seeing escaping from falling in a dream for a single woman If he sees this dream and is not affected by any injury in the dream, this is good news for him to reach a better and more happy life.

title: Interpretation of my husband’s dream of him giving me grapes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my husband giving me grapes in a dream. Some people may want to know the interpretation of a dream about my husband giving me grapes in a dream. It is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of that, and is this dream a sign of good or evil? Let us move to the reality of the dream and interpret it well, which is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of my husband’s dream of him giving me grapes in a dream. If a woman sees that her husband was giving her grapes in a dream, this may indicate good skin and a broad diet that she can have during this period. When she sees a husband giving grapes in a dream, this may indicate huge money and livelihood. Which marriage may gain during this time. If a woman sees that her husband is giving her grapes in a dream, this may indicate that she will become righteous very quickly and get rid of sorrows with the grace of God. When a woman sees that her husband is giving her grapes in a dream, this may indicate good circumstances and good changes. Which is happening in her life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams: My husband gave me five dinars in a dream. Seeing a husband giving a dinar to a woman in a dream may indicate good events that happen to the dreamer after a problem he faces. Dreaming of a husband giving me five dinars in a dream may indicate that he faced Some problems, crises and difficulties during this time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing the husband giving five dinars in a dream is an indication of bad events that the dreamer may go through during this period. If a husband dreams of giving his wife five dinars, this may indicate some problems. Finances and the difficulty that the dreamer is going through at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband giving me a gold necklace in a dream. Seeing the wife giving me a gold necklace in a dream indicates the happiness and joys that the woman feels at that time. It is possible that seeing the husband giving me a necklace Gold in a dream indicates that a woman and her husband have many benefits, thanks to God. A dream about giving a husband a gold necklace in a dream may indicate material gains that the dreamer may acquire during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband giving me a cake in a dream If a woman sees that her husband is giving her a cake in In a dream, this may indicate material changes that could happen to her during this period for the better. If a woman saw that her husband was offering her cake, this may indicate her intense love for her in those days. It is possible that seeing her husband offering cakes in a dream indicates The desire to fulfill desires and dreams, thanks to God. The dream in which she was offering it to the husband in the dream may indicate the relief that will come to the people of the house at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of my husband’s dream of him giving me water in a dream. The husband’s dream of giving his wife water in a dream may indicate the end of the feeling of loneliness during That period, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing the husband giving water to his wife in a dream may indicate getting rid of the diseases and suffering that the dreamer has suffered from for a long time. Seeing the husband giving water to his wife in a dream may indicate positive changes that will occur.

title: Interpretation of a ring in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Through this article, you can read in detail the interpretation of the ring in a dream for single people. The ring in reality is a symbol of engagement and indicates engagement or marriage officially and publicly in front of everyone, and this is one of the happy ones. Events in a girl’s life are manifested in finding a suitable life partner who completes the remaining years of her life. Moreover, this event is celebrated, whether at engagement parties or weddings, with the participation of family and friends, in an atmosphere of joy and pleasure, recorded with pictures that capture the most beautiful moments at these parties. But on the other hand, this vision intersects in the world of dreams with a happy event for one girl or reveals another, and otherwise we will learn this through an encyclopedia. Interpretation of a ring in a dream for a single woman. Seeing buying a ring in a dream for a single woman means kindness and livelihood in obtaining a new job or obtaining On a lot of money, and God knows best. But if an unmarried woman dreams that she is wearing a ring covered in rust, then this dream is unpleasant and indicates her relationship with a man who is in a bad mood in reality. If the ring is lost in a dream, this vision indicates for the unmarried girl who is engaged that it will end. Her relationship with her fiancé, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a ring on the right hand of an unmarried woman. In the case of wearing a ring on the right hand of an unmarried girl, this vision indicates the approaching of her wedding, if the girl is already engaged. But if the unmarried woman sees that she is wearing a wide ring This vision is only an indication of her relationship with a young man who does not suit her personality. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is wearing a ring on her right hand and quickly takes it off to wear it on her left hand, then this vision expresses the crises that the dreamer faces in reality regarding her emotional life. Wearing a ring on the left hand in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees that she is wearing a ring on her left hand made of iron, then this vision portends her marriage to a rich young man, and God knows best. When an unmarried woman wears a ring on her left hand while she is in a state of tension, this The vision indicates that she will marry a young man who has a great status in society. However, if the dreamer feels happy while wearing the ring on his left hand, this indicates that she will marry a young man who suits her in reality. We have presented to you the most important things mentioned in the interpretation of the ring in a dream for a single woman, and at the end In this article we must note that all these mentioned explanations are for information only and we cannot confirm their accuracy. In fact, because only God knows the unseen, and to interpret another dream, you can download the immediate application for interpreting dreams from the Encyclopedia. Bibliographic References 1

title: Carrying the dead and walking with him in a dream

preview.html: Today we will talk on the website gptafser.com/ about its meanings with all the details for men, women, young men and single girls. Interpretation of the vision of carrying a dead man and walking with him in a dream for a single girl. Seeing an unmarried girl carrying a dead man while he is wrapped and walking with him in a dream. A metaphor for concealment, luxury and success in her life. As for seeing A shroud without covering the dead person in the dream of an unmarried girl. It symbolizes the great sin that the dreamer committed in her life, and God knows best. If the unmarried girl sees that she is carrying a dead person she knows and walking with him and placing a crown on his head in the dream. This indicates that the deceased was martyred and that he is in a high position. High in Paradise, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person asking about the person’s condition. Interpretation of seeing carrying a dead person and walking with him in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman carrying a dead person and walking with him while he is in a shroud and covered in a dream. Eyesight is good and indicates that she loves concealment, frankness, and good morals. Also It symbolizes the intensity of religiosity and closeness to God Almighty. But if a married woman dreams that she is carrying a dead person, but he was not covered with a shroud in the dream. This indicates his delay in worship and prayer, and he is obliged to adhere to them, and God knows best. In the case of scenes of a married woman carrying a dead person. She was surprised by the return of life to life in a dream. The dream here is considered to draw the dreamer’s attention to undo her bad behavior that she is committing in her life, and God knows best. A married woman who sees in a dream that her husband is unable to carry a dead person and falls on top of him. It is a metaphor for breaking her husband’s back for her expenses. And its life and demands, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision of carrying the dead and walking with him in a dream about the man and its meaning: Seeing someone carrying a dead person in a dream, but not at a funeral in the known sense in the dream. This indicates that he follows the whims of his managers at work, whether they are right or wrong, and God knows best. A man sees himself walking with a dead person, and he was a scholar or a famous person, carrying him on his shoulders in a dream. It is a sign that he will take the path of this world, and God knows best. Seeing a dead person being carried and walking in a funeral in a dream for a man. That is, the dreamer seeks to provide his services to the directorate and the rulers. It is likely that he will abandon his dignity. Seeing a man carrying the dead and it is heavy for him and he cannot walk with him in the dream. It symbolizes that the man bears very great pressures and responsibilities. As for whoever sees that he is carrying an unknown dead person and walking with him to a funeral in a dream. The vision means that The dreamer earns his money from illegal sources. He must stop that in order to live a healthy life and eat halal food, and God knows best. A man dreams that he is carrying a dead person known to him in the dream and walks with him on a long road. It is a metaphor for his family or one of his brothers, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a vision A sick person in a dream is dead. The meaning of seeing a dead person carrying him and walking with him in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. A pregnant woman dreams of seeing a dead person and feeding her in a dream. Good skin because she receives a lot of kindness and easy delivery. As for a pregnant woman who attends a funeral in her dream. It means that she will go through normal and easy labor, and give birth. Peacefully and without danger. And immediately

This indicates that he follows the whims of his managers at work, whether they are right or wrong, and God knows best. A man sees himself walking with a dead person, and he was a scholar or a famous person, carrying him on his shoulders in a dream. It is a sign that he will take the path of this world, and God knows best. Seeing a dead person being carried and walking in a funeral in a dream for a man. That is, the dreamer seeks to provide his services to the directorate and the rulers. It is likely that he will abandon his dignity. Seeing a man carrying the dead and it is heavy for him and he cannot walk with him in the dream. It symbolizes that the man bears very great pressures and responsibilities. As for whoever sees that he is carrying an unknown dead person and walking with him to a funeral in a dream. The vision means that The dreamer earns his money from illegal sources. He must stop that in order to live a healthy life and eat halal food, and God knows best. A man dreams that he is carrying a dead person known to him in the dream and walks with him on a long road. It is a metaphor for his family or one of his brothers, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a vision A sick person in a dream is dead.
